discourse_list.title: Will Badges for a linked wallet be awarded to the Voting Wallet or the Cold Wallet?

content.content: In the context of a linked wallet, will the new forum badges be distributed to the hot wallet that does the voting? Or the cold wallet that delegate their voting power?
content.GPT-summary: The post is a question about the distribution of badges for a linked wallet in the context of voting. The author is asking for clarification on whether the badges will be awarded to the hot wallet that does the voting or the cold wallet that delegates their voting power.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: The badges account for your voting proxy so both will be eligible for the badges.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
